page.prototype: .ListItems as L (BYREF ResultString as C [, UserPrefix as C])
page.description: Lists the contents of the container as a CR-LF delimited string.
page.example:
dim ResultString as C dim SubContainer as A5Storage::SubContainer = null_value() dim Item as A5Storage::DataItem = null_value()
CallResult = A5Storage::SubContainer::Open(SubContainer, "Provider='Disk';Container='c:\A5Webroot';", "logs") ? CallResult.Success = .T.
? SubContainer.ListItems(ResultString) = .T.
showvar(ResultString)
